channel.title: Shannox on From Draenor With Love
channel.description: Recent content in Shannox on From Draenor With Love

item.title: Yellow Angry Man
item.description: If you’ve played a paladin at level 85 for any length of time, hopefully this requires no explanation. For those of you who haven’t, well. Perhaps you play a melee DPS. You’re at the boss’ feet, stabbing/slicing/cutting (or whatever else it is that you melee folks do). You hear an odd grunt. “ARRRRGH!” “GRRRRRR!” “RRRRRAAA!” This, my friends, is the Yellow, Angry Man. His anger knows no bounds. Likewise, his yellow-ness is unsurpassed.
